availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Edmonson County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Susan Madison. Married to Dicy Austill Madison in Edmonson County, Kentucky, on July 16, 1857. Father of Mary J. Madison, Asa Madison, John R. Madison, Green Madison, Catherine Madison, William H. Madison, Rutha Jane Madison, and James W. Madison. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1850. Farmer in Edmonson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, p. 35A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Brownsville, pp. 38-39.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Edmonson County Marriages, Film #001904235, p. 291.
